title: William Tecumseh Sherman (Leaders of the Civil War Era
description: This biography looks at the military career of General William Tecumseh Sherman. At the outbreak of the Civil war, he joined the Union Army, eventually becoming supreme commander of the armies in the West. His 'March to the Sea' campaign through Georgia was an inetgral reason for the surrender of the Confederate armies in 1865.
author: Rachel A. Koestler-Grack
